meanings.definition: A desire to learn or know more about something.
meanings.sent1: Her inquisitiveness about the stars led her to study astronomy.
meanings.sent2: His inquisitiveness about history made him a great researcher.
meanings.sent3: The cat's inquisitiveness about the new toy was adorable.
meanings.sent4: The child's inquisitiveness was a key to unlocking the mysteries of the ancient artifact.
meanings.sent5: The detective's inquisitiveness solved the puzzling case.

meanings.definition: Showing curiosity or interest in learning new things.
meanings.sent1: The inquisitive student always asked insightful questions.
meanings.sent2: Her inquisitive nature made her a great explorer.
meanings.sent3: The inquisitive puppy kept sniffing around the garden.
meanings.sent4: His inquisitive mind was like a sponge soaking up knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The inquisitive child's eyes sparkled with wonder at the science experiment.
